projects.name: Think Outside the Vox
projects.description: In order to raise awareness for global web accessibility, myself and two other developers designed and built a fully accessible and screen-reader friendly website for a nonprofit in need.
projects.image_alt: Think Outside the Vox website thumbnail

projects.name: Course Tracker
projects.description: A full stack web application built for the directors of Austin Coding Academy during my internship at Zollege. With a team of 4 developers, our goal was to deliver a useful tool for them to record and keep track of past and ongoing bootcamp courses.

projects.name: Zospace
projects.description: A product site developed from a mockup design with a team of 5 for our internship at Zollege. Our focus was on responsive design principles for a perfect layout on all screen sizes.

projects.name: Billy
projects.description: Billy is a full stack web app that helps users track and manage their monthly bills, quickly navigate to their banks' home pages, and find bank locations nearby.
